ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You alone we worship. You alone we ask for help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You alone we worship, and to You alone turn for help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: You alone do we worship, and You alone do we turn for help
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Lord), You alone We do worship and from You alone we do seek assistance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: You alone we worship and from You alone we seek help (and may we always).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: You we worship, and You we ask for help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Thee do we serve and Thee do we beseech for help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thee only we serve; to Thee alone we pray for succour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thee (alone) we worship; Thee (alone) we ask for help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You alone we worship, and to You alone we turn for help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thee alone do we worship and of Thee alone do we seek help,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You [alone] do we worship, and to You [alone] do we turn for help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thee do we worship, and Thine aid we seek.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: You (Alone) we worship, and you (Alone) we ask for help (for each and everything).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You (alone) we worship; and You (alone) we rely for help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is You we worship, and upon You we call for help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is You we worship and You we ask for help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [1:5] You [alone] we worship, and You [alone] we ask for help: that is to say, we reserve worship for You [alone] by way of acknowledging Your Oneness (tawhīd) and so on, and we ask for [Your] assistance in worship and in other things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thee (alone) we worship), we turn to you as the only One God and we obey you; ((Thee alone) we ask for help), we ask for your help in worshipping You and from You we obtain confidence in obeying You.
